DOC.brief_summary: To investigate the effect of treatment of HIV infection with highly active antiretroviral therapy on individual steps of reverse cholesterol transport, endothelial function and intima-media thickness in HIV patients.
DOC.brief_title: Impact of HIV and Its Treatment on Reverse Cholesterol Transport
